titles: An essay of the great effects of even languid and unheeded motion whereunto is annexed An experimental discourse of some little observed causes of the insalubrity and salubrity of the air and its effects / by the Honourable Robert Boyle ...
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publisher: Printed by M. Flesher for Richard Davis ...,
notes: "An experimental discourse of some unheeded causes of the insalubrity and salubrity of the air" has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
